Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacterium:Escherichia coli (MIC>80 µM);Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus (MIC>80 µM), Staphylococcus epidermidis (MIC>80 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.22467870] HD50>25 µM against human type A red blood cells.
Sequence Information.Comments: IC50=2.4 µM, HD50>25 µM.##Note IC50 (concentration that gives a survival index of 50%) and HD50 (concentration that causes 50% lysis of red blood cells).

Literature.Title: Novel Cyclotides and Uncyclotides with Highly Shortened Precursors from Chassalia chartacea and Effects of Methionine Oxidation on Bioactivities.
Literature.Author: Nguyen GK, Lim WH, Nguyen PQ, Tam JP.
